short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a command to the right-click context menu for links that searches for an URL encoded in the query string and, if found, open it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supports http(s) and magnet URLs.
Just right-click on a link and select the "Extract URL from Query String". If nothing happens, no link was found.

This is a one-trick pony tailored for a specific use case and I'm publishing it just for fun, but suggestions are welcome.
